synopsis.text: Because the peculiar Mikoto Urabe sleeps on her desk, carries scissors in her underwear, and has no friends, she's an enigma to her classmate, Akira Tsubaki. But when Akira impulsively tastes Urabe's drool, his world turns upside down, and he becomes inexplicably drawn to her. As they begin an unusual romance, Akira and Urabe, along with their friends, navigate the challenges and mysteries of high school love. Through their journey, they discover that Urabe's eccentricities extend beyond her strange habits, making their relationship anything but ordinary.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
